description.title: Innovative Solutions
description.content: Joined a forward-thinking company focused on CRM solutions and innovative marketing strategies.

description.title: Product Development
description.content: Currently working on the development of a comprehensive CRM system, incorporating dashboards for various roles including Research Analysts, Contact Verification, and SWAT teams.

description.title: Frontend Development
description.content: Utilizing React.js for dynamic user interfaces, with a focus on modern design using Ant Design for consistency and Tailwind CSS for responsive landing pages.

description.title: Backend and Database Management
description.content: Engaged in backend development with PHP and database management to support CRM functionalities and ensure seamless data handling.

description.title: API Integration
description.content: Enhancing product connectivity and integration through API development and management.

description.title: Innovative Solutions
description.content: Employed by a product-based US company specializing in innovative solutions.

description.title: Product Development
description.content: Contributed to the development of "connectmate.io" a prominent product within the company.

description.title: Seamless Integration
description.content: Proficiently integrated Airtable and Webflow through React.js for seamless functionality.

description.title: UI Refactoring Leadership
description.content: Spearheaded the refactoring of the user interface (UI), transitioning from the old design to a modern UI using React and Ant Design.

description.title: API Expertise
description.content: Demonstrated expertise in API integration to enhance the overall functionality and connectivity of the product.
